product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies MagBar Fire Starter - Special Buy
long_description: The Ultimate Survival Technologies MagBar Fire Starter reliably starts hundreds of fires in adverse weather, making it a backcountry accessory you'll want to keep within easy reach. Magnesium block comes with flint strike bar; keychain keeps them together. MagBar Fire Starter measures 2 in., perfect for carrying on a keychair or tucking in a pocket. Special buy.
short_description: The Ultimate Survival Technologies MagBar Fire Starter reliably starts hundreds of fires in adverse weather, making it a backcountry accessory you'll want to keep within easy reach.
